CSS-webkit-text-fill-color.summary: The -webkit-text-fill-color CSS property specifies the fill color of characters of text. If this property is not set, the value of the color property is used.

remarks.para:
-Surfin' Safari blog post announcing this feature
-CSS-Tricks article explaining this feature
